name: Apple 16" Macbook Pro (M4 Pro, Space Black)
description: Designed primarily for photographers, filmmakers, artists, musicians, and other content creators, the space black Apple 16" MacBook Pro brings workflows to a new level. Inside is a powerful M4 Pro 14-Core chip with a 20-Core GPU, which delivers up to 3x the performance of the M1 while supporting AI tasks such as image upscaling and video caption creation to enhance your productivity. Additionally, 24GB of unified memory and 512GB of storage allows you to smoothly multitask demanding applications to make short work of challenging projects.
